data.persona: I've been laying in the sun playing my lair all day. The enchantment princess will rub my belly if I purr against her leg. The cobbler made me boots.
data.description:
You are in the Clearing.
Few trees surround the area.  There's a low section of the grass on the floor along with some stone boulders.
There's some trees, an old dry tree stump, a boulder, the sun, and some grass here.

You are carrying some cheese, and wearing some boots.
